snippet: With the deal for the health care provider Amil Participações, UnitedHealth is aiming to capitalize on the favorable demographics of Brazil, which is enjoying a strong economy and a growing middle class.
abstract: With the deal for the health care provider Amil Participações, UnitedHealth is aiming to capitalize on the favorable demographics of Brazil, which is enjoying a strong economy and a growing middle class.

headline.main: UnitedHealth to Buy Control of Brazilian Company for $4.9 Billion
headline.print_headline: UnitedHealth to Buy 90% of Brazilian Provider
